title: How to Make Potato Scones

steps.headline: Sieve the flour, baking powder and salt.
Rub the fat into the flour mixture.
Pass the boiled potatoes through a sieve.
steps.description: Add the sieved potatoes to the flour mixture and mix well to form a dough.

steps.headline: Shape the dough into round pieces or cut using a scone cutter or the mouth of a glass.
steps.description: Place evenly across the baking tray.

steps.headline: Place in a hot oven and bake for 10 minutes.
steps.description: Turn over briefly after 10 minutes to bake a few minutes more.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: These are best served warm. Keep wrapped in a clean tea towel to preserve the warmth.

text: Sieve the flour, baking powder and salt.  Rub the fat into the flour mixture.  Pass the boiled potatoes through a sieve. Add the sieved potatoes to the flour mixture and mix well to form a dough. Shape the dough into round pieces or cut using a scone cutter or the mouth of a glass. Place evenly across the baking tray. Place in a hot oven and bake for 10 minutes. Turn over briefly after 10 minutes to bake a few minutes more. Serve. These are best served warm. Keep wrapped in a clean tea towel to preserve the warmth.
